name: @hatchet-dev/pickaxe-cli

scripts.prepublish: cp package.json dist/package.json; cp README.md dist/; cp -r templates dist/; node -e "const pkg=JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync('dist/package.json','utf8')); pkg.main='index.js'; pkg.bin.pickaxe='./index.js'; require('fs').writeFileSync('dist/package.json',JSON.stringify(pkg,null,2));"
scripts.publish:ci: rm -rf ./dist && npm run dump-version && npm run tsc:build && npm run prepublish && cd dist && npm publish --access public --no-git-checks

description: CLI tool for managing components, agents, and tools
